directions: Combine the black beans, tahini, yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and salt in the bowl of a blender or food processor; blend until smooth. Chill 1 hour before serving. Drizzle with 1 teaspoon olive oil to garnish.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
title: Black Bean Hummus with Tahini
